title: Queen of the Forest feat. Mari Heller & Jorma Taccone
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Actors, directors and real-life couple Marielle Heller (The Queen's Gambit, MacGruber) and Jorma Taccone (MacGruber, The Lonely Island) headline a tale about bossy bullies and itsy-bitsy underdogs.
